DataElement.preferredName: Methamphetamine Type Stimulant Past 30 Days Use Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not a participant used methamphetamine-type stimulants in the past 30 days.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Methamphetamine Type CNS Stimulant Past 30 Days Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An amphetamine with central nervous system (CNS) stimulating activity. Methamphetamine acts by both facilitating the release of catecholamines, particularly noradrenaline, dopamine and serotonin, from nerve terminals in the brain and by inhibiting their uptake. This leads to an increase in synaptic concentration of these neurotransmitters and results in increased stimulation of postsynaptic receptors._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._Any agent capable of having a stimulating effect on the central nervous system (CNS).:A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._To put into action or service.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An amphetamine with central nervous system (CNS) stimulating activity. Methamphetamine acts by both facilitating the release of catecholamines, particularly noradrenaline, dopamine and serotonin, from nerve terminals in the brain and by inhibiting their uptake. This leads to an increase in synaptic concentration of these neurotransmitters and results in increased stimulation of postsynaptic receptors._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._Any agent capable of having a stimulating effect on the central nervous system (CNS).

Concepts.definition: An amphetamine with central nervous system (CNS) stimulating activity. Methamphetamine acts by both facilitating the release of catecholamines, particularly noradrenaline, dopamine and serotonin, from nerve terminals in the brain and by inhibiting their uptake. This leads to an increase in synaptic concentration of these neurotransmitters and results in increased stimulation of postsynaptic receptors.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
Any agent capable of having a stimulating effect on the central nervous system (CNS).

Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._To put into action or service.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.
To put into action or service.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated to support Head and Neck Cancers
